title: How do I receive the gift of the Holy Ghost?
short_title: How do I receive the gift of the Holy Ghost?
content: How do I receive the gift of the Holy Ghost?

After we are baptized, we receive the ordinance of confirmation. As part of this ordinance, we are told to “receive the Holy Ghost.” This means the Holy Ghost can be our constant companion if we desire and invite His presence in our lives and faithfully keep the commandments.
How has the gift of the Holy Ghost comforted or helped you personally? When have you felt close to the Spirit? What experiences can you share with the young women?
Do you know of any experiences the young women have had with the gift of the Holy Ghost? Do they understand what they must do to be worthy of the companionship of the Holy Ghost?
What scriptures and talks will help the young women understand how the gift of the Holy Ghost will help them and bless them throughout their lives?

That We May Always Have His Spirit to Be with Us
The Gift of the Holy Ghost

The Savior shared simple stories, parables, and real-life examples that made sense to those he taught. He helped them discover gospel lessons in their own experiences. How can you help the young women appreciate ways the gift of the Holy Ghost helps them through their own experiences?

At the beginning of each class, invite the young women to share, teach, and testify about the experiences they have had applying what they learned in the previous week’s lesson. This will encourage personal conversion and help the young women see the relevance of the gospel in their daily lives.
Choose from these ideas or think of your own to introduce this week’s lesson:
As a class, listen to or sing the hymn “
.” What do the young women learn from this hymn about what we must do to receive the Holy Ghost?

Invite the young women to think about the day when they were confirmed members of the Church and told to “receive the Holy Ghost.” How has the gift of the Holy Ghost blessed them? What questions do they have about the gift of the Holy Ghost?
